dmca.title: Contact the Federal Bureau of Investigation
dmca.body:
To Whom It May Concern:

Please note that below-referenced copyright infringement notice does not
substantially comply with the required notification elements of the Digital
Millennium Copyright Act of 1998 ("DMCA").

Please note that we have not passed on the substantive merits of your claim.

Please visit our web site at www.theplanet.com/legal.
 
Legal Response Team
THEPLANET.COM INTERNET SERVICES, INC.

-----Original Message-----
From: Nathalie Hoffmann [mailto:nathaliehoffmann@zzmail.de] 
Posted At: Friday, August 11, 2006 3:03 AM
Posted To: Legal Response
Conversation: Contact the Federal Bureau of Investigation
Subject: Contact the Federal Bureau of Investigation


Dear Sirs,

I am little bit surprised about the fact, that the two illegal MP3 portals, hosted
on your servers, are still online:

Domain Name: MP3ONLYHITS.COM
Domain Name: MUZZONE.COM

It is very obvious, that this is a criminal act ! Do I have to contact the Federal
Bureau of Investigation and submit a crime tip (www.fbi.gov), to stop this crime, or
what ???

Best regards

Nathalie Hoffmann
N
